isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TURBOCHARGER ASSEMBLY (ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED); REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Remove engine housing cover.
Disconnect charge air cooler outlet hose at turbocharger and reposition.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbocharger.
Remove air intake duct between turbocharger and air cleaner
Disconnect turbocharger oil supply hose, oil drain hose and wiring harness.
Remove turbocharger assembly mounting nuts closest to engine.
Remove engine mount bolt from right rear mount and loosen right front.
Raise engine assembly on right side using bottle jack placed under flywheel housing.
Remove turbocharger assembly.
Clean mounting surfaces and parts.
Install turbocharger assembly to exhaust manifold flange (do not tighten at this time).
Install turbocharger oil drain hose.
Tighten all turbocharger assembly mount nuts.
Lower engine and install engine mounting bolts.
Connect turbocharger oil supply hose and wiring harness.
Install air intake duct between turbocharger and air cleaner.
Connect exhaust outlet pipe to turbocharger.
Connect charge air cooler outlet hose to turbocharger.
Start engine assembly and check for leaks.
Install engine housing cover.
Remove wheel chocks.
